• CSIS publishes daily, independent, bipartisan analysis — search our analysis below.
  • CSIS produces transcripts Link: https://www.csis.org/analysis?=&type=publication&field_publication_type%5b1%5d=1241 of selected events and multimedia.
  • For more of our interactive analysis and micro-websites, see Web Projects Link: https://www.csis.org/web-projects or visit CSIS’s iDeas Lab Link: https://www.csis.org/programs/dracopoulos-ideas-lab .
  • Sign up Link: https://www.csis.org/subscribe for updates and to subscribe.

Will Covid-19 Create a New Labor Market in Argentina? Link: /analysis/will-covid-19-create-new-labor-market-argentina

May 29, 2020 | Gabriel Sánchez Zinny Link: /people/gabriel-s%C3%A1nchez-zinny The Covid-19 pandemic has accelerated digitization and automation processes, which will have a significant impact on work in Argentina.

May 29, 2020

Newsletter

We are pleased to share the May 2020 issue of the Global Economics Monthly (GEM). This month’s GEM features new written works from Simon Chair experts, including the launch of our new event series, Economy Disrupted.

Interactive

Pyongsan Uranium Concentrate Plant (Nam-chon Chemical Complex) Link: https://beyondparallel.csis.org/pyongsan-uranium-concentrate-plant-nam-chon-chemical-complex/

May 29, 2020 | Joseph S. Bermudez Jr. Link: /people/joseph-s-bermudez-jr , Victor Cha Link: /people/victor-cha

In Beyond Parallel Link: http://beyondparallel.csis.org The Pyongsan Uranium Concentrate Plant occupies a critical role in North Korea’s nuclear research and weapons programs as the sole known provider of uranium oxide (yellowcake) for fuel fabrication or enrichment.

Report

Challenges to Continued U.S. Leadership Ahead of Global HIV’s Next Phase Link: /analysis/challenges-continued-us-leadership-ahead-global-hivs-next-phase

May 28, 2020 | Maggie McCarten-Gibbs Link: /people/maggie-mccarten-gibbs , Sara M. Allinder Link: /people/sara-m-allinder The world is off-track to meet the first UNAIDS Fast Track goals toward controlling the global HIV epidemic. Concerted, well-financed, and targeted action is needed now to get on track. United States actions could make or break the next phase of the HIV response.

Commentary

Economics Is All About Disruption Link: /analysis/economics-all-about-disruption

May 28, 2020 | Matthew P. Goodman Link: /people/matthew-p-goodman

CSIS’s Matthew P. Goodman explains that economics has always involved disruption. The new CSIS Economics Program will seek to illuminate the role of economics in international affairs and offer practical policy ideas to enhance U.S. and global prosperity and security.

Commentary

May 28, 2020 | Samuel Brannen Link: /people/samuel-brannen , Kathleen H. Hicks Link: /people/kathleen-h-hicks , Seth G. Jones Link: /people/seth-g-jones , Rebecca Hersman Link: /people/rebecca-hersman , Todd Harrison Link: /people/todd-harrison Scholars from the CSIS International Security Program offer their assessment of how Covid-19 will reshape geopolitics over the next decade and beyond.
